website_summaries.verdict: Its upwards-facing speakers provide a much fuller sound than you may expect, making it a top pick for gaming and watching movies.
pros: Crisp and immersive Dolby Atmos audio
Innovative design delivers a surround sound-like experience
cons: A bit on the pricy side

customer_reviews.title: Must say my older one sounded better. But after some tweaks and adjustments
customer_reviews.text: I had an older Vizio. Must say my older one sounded better. But after some tweaks and adjustments. This one has a little more bass response. Please make sure you turn off the Eco Power function. For months I was hating this thing because it almost always needed to be, restart, reset or repaired. One day I thought to myself? "I wonder if it's cutting off on its own and not remembering its last state?" Many times the app would show it still online when the power was off. Turn off Echo power and have not had the issue since. Only wish Vizio would give more info on why Eco Power is not as functional as it reads.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Subwoofer and Rear Speakers wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews that the Subwoofer did not work, and I thought it was just bad luck. Well, I must have had back luck as well because the subwoofer and rear speakers would work for 3 seconds and shut off. I tried EVERYTHING to fix it, even called Vizio support, and nothing. I was told to return it. I actually ended up buying another Vizio product with the larger cube subwoofer, and it works perfect. I was willing to give this product another shot because of the price and compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Perdomo

customer_reviews.title: Best 5.1 Surround Sound option
customer_reviews.text: My receiver went out, so I researched receivers for a replacement when I came across this sound bar. I mounted it on my wall under my TV, placed the base under my couch. Instead of using the included reer left and right speakers, I chose to use the two I had already in my wall. I did have to play with the sound settings, after I installed the phone app. to my preferences. One setting I would recommend to all is to disable Eco mode (so the base wouldn't power off if I had the TV paused for an extended amount of time) otherwise it will always power off when powering off the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Xfertime

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbars. Excellent value. Streams awesomely.
customer_reviews.text: Everything great. Easy to mount, synchronized immediately. Just don't purchase the suggested Sanus speaker stands. Factory wires from Vizio won't fit through tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Chafmaster

customer_reviews.title: Quality going the wrong way
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Vizio sound bar. My 2.1 bar works fine after 4 yrs. My original 42" 5.1 bar died last month so I replaced it with the VIZIO SB4051-D5. The quality of this bar's sound & ease of use is inferior to my other two even though this one is theoretically more advanced. It's also much more difficult to control w/ a Fios remote than the others. Doesn't power on w/ TV & cable box. In addition, "smart cast" is an oxymoron. VERY disappointing & Vizio's product "support" isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Berks

customer_reviews.title: Had my doubts
customer_reviews.text: Love this system. We had a sony surround sound system that died in a flood. Went for this because we have hardwood floors now and didn't want speaker wires. I think this system sounds better and has 100 watts less than our sony. We particularly like the thin but powerful woofer.If this holds up like the Sony did we will be very happy. I don't think you can go wrong with this soundbar. The best part is nobody sees it,but what a sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound System
customer_reviews.text: I wish the rear speakers were wireless, but other than that this is perfect. I love the fact that you can hide the sub woofer under the couch or bed or it can lay flat on the tv stand. The sound quality is amazing. I would totally recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is exceptional
customer_reviews.text: Boosted the sound system of a 6 yr old 60" Visio Smart TV. Controller is a bit small (I am old) but you can control the system with your phone or laptop and you can link other Visio soundbars and play music throughout the home. I love it! I did not use tech support to connect other systems and devices but would if I had to do it over again. amazon's tech support has proven to be invaluable for many purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Remove is basic and lacks function, but I don’t use it anyway. I use the app on my phone which allows for way more function. Otherwise easy setup, good sound quality, good value. Love the slim sub behind my couch.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sounds
customer_reviews.text: Easily installed and I even used a Wifi dongle purchased in 2010 I had instead of trying to route an Ethernet cable to the soundbar. Seamless so far TV off & on and the unit does not have any delay. Highly recommend It revitalized my old 2013-45" Samsung LED performance. Unit included all the needed wires but I used some previously purchased Medialink Optic wire from Amazon years ago. Better wires/ connections yield higher quality sound/ picture...
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeStyle

customer_reviews.title: Great 5.1 System!
customer_reviews.text: I have this attached with an optical cord to a 75 inch vizio Smart TV. Sound is great, I purchased mounting brackets to mount just below the TV so I still have access to the control buttons on top. The slim subwoofer works great, even better than I thought it would. I would definately Recommend this setup for any configuration.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous4life

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was iffy when I originally ordered these to replace a cheap samsung surround sound DVD speaker set I had at half the price. BUT, the sound quality is great, the speakers are sleek and look very nice. The under the couch design of the sub woofer is excellent. You can literally feel the bass. I had to lower the bass and subwoofer due to complaints from my tenant above me. Great bass, great sound. My only complaint is the remote is basic, and really needs an LED light, but that it nit picking. Working absolutely seamless with my Vizio 70" tv. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Alena

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is amazing. Initial setup is extremely easy when you use the HDMI ARC connections. However, if you switch the input on the sound bar to say, Bluetooth, like to hook it up to your phone, good luck trying to switch it back to HDMI ARC so you can use it with the tv again. It takes me 4 or 5 try’s to get it to reconnect. Other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. PHILLIPS

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost, easy surround sound solution.
customer_reviews.text: Good room filling sound with great bass for such a compact subwoofer. It's not audiophile quality, but I didn't expect it to be for the price. It's a very good quality solution for a 1st time surround sound system or for someone who doesn't want to mess with the hassle of a traditional system. It also paired well with the rest of my google home speakers to add the livingroom to a speaker group with the rest of the house. The remote is awful, you cant see what it's doing without the lights in the room on. Fortunately with the HDMI ARC the TV & cable box remotes work the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny C

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Had problems at first. It turns out the problem was from the D class vizio tv. When I upgraded to a new e class, there were no problems. Works beautifully and sounds great. The HDMI ports on the d class won't support this soundbar, but the e class will.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Speaker failed after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The left speaker failed after less than 6 months, and less than a month of use. I originally had these in a bonus room that was rarely used. I decided to move them down to the main tv and speaker decided to give out almost immediately. The left speaker works fine and the system is great when it works. With only one side speaker working, the system is basically just a sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: works, but a lot of communication issues. Smartcast needs to improve
customer_reviews.text: a lot of communication issues. when it works, sound is great! As sound bar for the TV works without problem, but if you want to use it for casting music form your cell is a real pain#%#$%.... Buy it if you don't have budget for anything better as I did :D
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Wireless Control
customer_reviews.text: I love the bar itself, and when it works I'm more than happy. But both the bluetooth and the built in Chrome Cast struggle so badly to stay connected to my phone, which is only about 5 feet away, it makes the bar practically unusable from my phone, which is the primary purpose I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysWright

customer_reviews.title: easy install
customer_reviews.text: Took 15 minutes to set up, programmed to the Vizio TV remote and the Spectrum cable remote, works with my iphone 11, sounds great, synced up with tv after slight adjustment, uused optical connection as tv does not have hdmi audio out. great unit for the price, bar is perfect length for Vizio P65 tv.
customer_reviews.author: Steven King

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a year
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year of having it and it stops bluetoothikg to my phone and the mute doesn’t work on remote along with the volume no longer works. Rediculous for the price. Should have lasted at least five years. Trash now.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rymer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk. It sounds great, but you have to repeatedly turn it off and back on to connect to the sound bar. I highly recommend you do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: KatieLee

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to get set up to my specifications, but, it worked out fine. Bass is really heavy. I live in an apartment and don't need to upset my neighbors. So I have to be careful. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: petenkathy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: True 5.1 sound bar with wireless subwoofer and rear speakers. Easy setup. Sounds great! Down side: you can’t adjust bass or treble. Can’t adjust sound output of rear speakers. Overall I would recommend for a bedroom or little tv/game room, but get a Bose system for a true movie room or looking for something that will blast music too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vaught

customer_reviews.title: Rear speaker sound is practically non-existent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sound bar to get at least a partial surround sound without the bother of wiring to the rear speakers from the sound bar. Sadly the sound from the rear speakers is practically non-existent with no ability to increase the sound of the rear speakers. I am seriously considering returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dostal

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, easy setup, great price point
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, with deep bass, fullness, and good depth. 5.1 is a great upgrade from 2.1. I put the 5.1 in the living room and wall mounted the rear speakers, and moved the 2.1 to the bedroom and it's is much more fitting. Definitely would recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Nurseman

customer_reviews.title: Look someplace else.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great when it works. Most of the time it stops in the middle of what I’m watching and powers off without warning. I have to physically remove the power cord to get the sound to come back on. Tech support was unhelpful.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great Audio and Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: Using it with a Vizio television. The installation was incredibly simple, and the audio quality is fantastic. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL W.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this sound bar for a month now and so far so good. It was very easy to pair up with my TV and the quality is pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: HNW

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality through the sound bar is only marginally better than the television built in speakers
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality through the sound bar is only marginally better than the television built in speakers. The subwoofer and satellite speakers simply don’t work. They lose wireless connectivity constantly and most attempts to reconnect fail. Every now and again, I can get them to connect, but it seems random. The iPhone application loses connection with the speaker just as often. And I’ve waited too long to return it. Pretty big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Creme-de-la-Creme
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two previous Vizio 5.1 models, both premium and mid-line versions. This is better than both. The sub-woofer is clear and does not distort, and the modern WiFi casting and HDMI ARC features are a sure improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Putnam Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great sound great product
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great. Use it daily for both tv and Bluetooth for music. Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It sounds really good with music on 2.1 The 5.1 is so so. The rear speakers just need more power.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Super system
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound bar and sub. Why pay high prices when Vizio outperforms all other. Great system and awesome sound!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Yonat

customer_reviews.title: Packed with crisp sound and deep bass
customer_reviews.text: Great system. Originally bought it for my 55” Vizio and it worked great. Sound is crisp and deep base. Upgraded my TV and this system works great with Samsung as well. Bought a second system for my dad for Christmas and he’s been thrilled with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Natkinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound bar...performs well...previous generation model was a bit stronger, and I lost it in a power surge - bummer...but this one is still nice...smaller components don't put out with the depth of the sound the other one I had to replace did...I hope this helps?
customer_reviews.author: Skosdan

customer_reviews.title: I liked the sound but had trouble reconnecting the sub to ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sound but had trouble reconnecting the sub to the sound bar after a couple of days. I was able to re-pair them a few times, but that was it. I contacted vizio, they got me a replacement unit, and it's been perfect ever since. I did lost connection once but that was due to an extended pause, where the sound bar was getting no feed. A restart of the soundbar and sub allowed them to pair with no interaction from me.
customer_reviews.author: joel j

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup Sound quality is enough for my room and still able to be heard in garage and all rooms in the house 1400sf
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like is that you have to re-pair the sound bar to the sub every once in a while
customer_reviews.author: Rainy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced my Sony 7.1 system. Excellent sound. Especially like the Bluetooth wireless sub. It’s nice not having to run wires from the sound bar to the sub.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great sound / great price
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound if you have limited space or lazy like me to mount other solutions on the wall. My only issue is that the audio sometime is off sync from the video. Not sure who to blame. Could be my tv.
customer_reviews.author: Diogenes

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Wow great sound quality Especially the base deep and loud love it
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Sub woofer needs to be re-paired to the sound bar EVERY TIME I turn on the sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: The sub woofer needs to be re-paired with the sound bar EVERY TIME I turn on the soundbar. The re-pair instructions don't work, just trial and error until the sub woofer comes on. Contacted Vizio support who walked me through hard re-boot and a factory re-set. Nothing worked. They said the unit needs to be returned. I am returning this unit. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Strohdave

customer_reviews.title: So.... close! Needs more umph!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty-good product. I wish the back speakers 🔊 and sub-woofer were louder.
customer_reviews.author: TnT Account

customer_reviews.title: Vizio is a fraud
customer_reviews.text: Delivered open box product as new. The box game with a packing slip with another customer's name in it. I will never buy from Vizio again
customer_reviews.author: Toni Beretini

customer_reviews.title: Scratched to hell and didn’t tell
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is fine, the remote is a little basic but it does allow you to adjust all the speakers individually which is nice. I’m just pissed that it’s scratched to hell and the seller didn’t make that known
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker system I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality. Easy setup and works well with all devices
customer_reviews.author: roberjaw

customer_reviews.title: Tech support was not very helpful. Had trouble pairing ...
customer_reviews.text: Tech support was not very helpful. Had trouble pairing with Samsung 65" tv. Had to call Samsung to resolve issue.
customer_reviews.author: JMacd

customer_reviews.title: Subwoofer no longer connecting
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, and description made it very promising, unfortunately an issue started to happen a few days into using it, where the subwoofer would not turn on with the speaker, a simple power on and off with the remote would fix it.. Now it has completely failed to connect, only way to get it to connect is by unplugging from the wall and back again. This is a very inconvenient because the subwoofer is under the couch and the couch is against the wall where the AC plug and Subwoofer is connected to, meaning we have to Pull the couch out in order to reset the power. Vizio, Amazon, someone must fix this, please. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Humberto

customer_reviews.title: Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if its working or not. I don't know if I have it hooked up right, guess I will have to research it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this and are glad we added it to our television. It was easy to set up and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli Boes

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. For the price you get theater sound quality. Subwoofer literally shakes my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his sound bar. We used to have our TV volume between 40-50 (out of 100). Now we can get the same volume at 10-15. The subwoofer really gets the dog interested when there are other dogs, etc. on the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth drops
customer_reviews.text: The Blue tooth connection to the base and rear speakers keeps dropping. Then it does not always pair back up again. This was a refurbished unit though which may have something to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Nothwehr

customer_reviews.title: Holly Sh@t!
customer_reviews.text: this sound bar is awesome! the base this slim sub woofer delivers is AMAZING. big time smile on my face i shopped around for quite some time before i made this purchase and i am so glad i chose this one . vizio allll day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound bar
customer_reviews.text: I’m unable to get the bass and satalite speakers to work with the sound bar. Unable to keep other devices paired with the sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: James Scialdo

customer_reviews.title: great for price
customer_reviews.text: great sound bar for the price. i love it sound great and like the fact that its easy to set up and take down if i have to move. first system i have bought in several years happy with results
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away. No warranty support for known issues.
customer_reviews.text: Subwoofer woofer and satellite speaker sound cuts out after 2-3 seconds of being turned on. This is a known issue and vizio support refuses to fix the issue. Very disappointing. I am definitely staying away from purchasing their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Creighton Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good and easy to add to the TV
customer_reviews.author: Ggirl

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 in my home
customer_reviews.text: I already had this Visio sound bar for our family room and loved it enough to buy a second for our living room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remember to set TV search to correct device.
customer_reviews.text: less clutter with a great sound. Set up was easier than I made it lol. And the bluetooth is awsome. Have nothing negative have had this for two or three weeks. Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: tammy pratt

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: THE ALL THE WIRESD ARE MISSING AS WELL AS THE STAND TO THE SUBWOOFER AND
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, sounds just like in a theater or at a concert
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, it cuts out constantly and you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, it cuts out constantly and you have to unplug it to restart it all of the time. Very bad product.
customer_reviews.author: crazy shipping

customer_reviews.title: Looking for this soundbar for a while
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar is the best, great sound, easy to set up and overall Visio has the market on soundbar!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money I spent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sound system a year ago, I love it. The sound is awesome, so worth the money I spent!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Derron johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good sound!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Had trouble at first connecting optically with not much succession. In the process of moving it sat idle. Just today set up via hdmi arc and everything was just plug and play. Turned on the subwoofer and it paired without my intervention.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Long

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: For what you pay, you get a great sound system for your study! They need to work on their remote interface, but Great Value after 10 years, I bought 2 more systems this month
customer_reviews.author: Hong Tu Pyramyth Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice bass and volume I underestimated it because it is the slim model but it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is fantastic, and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is fantastic, and it looks great. The only problem I've had sometimes is, the unit won't always acknowledge my HDMI setup unless I unplug the unit.
customer_reviews.author: philip d cason

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easy setup. Display on remote could be a little easier to read but other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MR. S

customer_reviews.title: Soundbar turns itself down.
customer_reviews.text: Soundbar continually turns itself down without warning. Otherwise sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: John Scully

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It’s the second one I own and greatly appreciate my tv nights.
customer_reviews.author: Saulnier M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Soundbar works great. Subwoofer on the other hand works for 3-4 seconds before disconnecting. Tried all trouble shooting steps. Tec support just asked if I could turn it off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with this system for the price. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Far exceeded my expectations. Blows away any surround system I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Sounded better than expected. Great price. Remote needs a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome unit! Better than my LG surround sound by far.
customer_reviews.author: Benton Launerts

customer_reviews.title: THE SELLER DID A GOOD JOB WITH MY RETURN
customer_reviews.text: THE SUBWOOFER KEPT TURNING OFF AND NEEDED TO BE RECONNECTED EVERYTIME I USED THE SOUND BAR. THE SELLER DID A GOOD JOB WITH MY RETURN. JUST NOT IMPRESSED BY ANOTHER VIZIO PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Mark Freyberg

customer_reviews.title: only on and off for 14 months and no warranty ...
customer_reviews.text: only on and off for 14 months and no warranty. my first and last vizio.
customer_reviews.author: wait or not

customer_reviews.title: he picked it out and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift from my boyfriend, he picked it out and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tassy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the best home theater systems I've ever had. very good sound I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Javier montelongo

customer_reviews.title: Sub woofer never stays paired spend hours trying to re ...
customer_reviews.text: Sub woofer never stays paired spend hours trying to re pair it every time. Power cord to sub woofer falls out with the tiniest vibration which since its sub woofer is always.
customer_reviews.author: keith b.

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I didn't like was that I had to keep pairing my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I didn't like was that I had to keep pairing my phone with it every time I want to play music from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: hard worker

customer_reviews.title: Third Time is The Charm.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it when I first set it up because it suffered from the loss of Bluetooth connectivity problem. Thankfully Vizio support was great and after the third replacement all is now well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Sound fades out very often.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, but the sound goes out often - requiring restarting ALL THE TIME. Also, the sound doesn't always come on after the system has been off for a while - again, more restarting required! Not worth the daily hassle. Returning product! Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bk13

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry that I didn't buy this sooner; the sound is GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: villip gatlin

customer_reviews.title: This is an awful product. The Bluetooth on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awful product. The Bluetooth on the sub woofer will for sure fail on you, then you are left with an over priced sound bar with no surround and no bass. Buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a Sound Bar on steroids... in a bad way
customer_reviews.text: You will not be able to hear dialogue from music or movies from the 2 small satellite speakers (No settings allow this, spoke with VIZIO representative). They only increase the background audio which is alright and they aren't that loud even if you increase the sound of them. So it pretty much feels likes a sound bar with bass. Not worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: blau

customer_reviews.title: it's very nice, and looks modern and elegant
customer_reviews.text: finally i installed the sound system, it's very nice, and looks modern and elegant, so far i'm very happy with it, may be little more bass will be OK, but it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Villasenor

customer_reviews.title: Disconnection issues but solid bass and wireless speakers led to a 2 star rating
customer_reviews.text: The system continues to drop the sound signal when using my Apple TV (4th Gen). It also happens with my Xfinity X1 cable box so it seems to be a speaker system issue. I've done all the firmware upgrades and I am still having issues. Both of these inputs use HDMI-ARC. Hoping I am able to get support from Vizio, otherwise I will be looking to return. The range of inputs on the sounder speaker and the level of bass are the reasons for my 2 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Keener

customer_reviews.title: I never got to use this because the sound bar ...
customer_reviews.text: I never got to use this because the sound bar wouldn't link with the subwoofer. I contacted vizio and they are sending me a replacement one but this one bought off here didn't work....
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great bass and good for movies. Love how the subwoofer is wireless and slim.
customer_reviews.text: I use the HDMI ARC input and it came paired on arrival. I reset it by mistake but I read the instructions on how to pair it again. I am not using the SmartApp that you can download because I read that the firmware isn't that great. Bass is strong, sometimes too strong. It is great for watching movies and listening to music with heavy bass. I am overall happy with my purchase as it meets my criteria for what I am using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Liang

customer_reviews.title: It has great sound and an app that allows you to set ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a large living area in our second home. It has great sound and an app that allows you to set all the surround sound particulars for the perfect combination to suit your preferences. It was a hundred dollars less than even Costco or Sam's, and for the price, it is the best system out there!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Helgeson

customer_reviews.title: The Plus is it fits nicely below the TV--The Negative
customer_reviews.text: The Plus is it fits nicely below the TV--The Negative, The satellite speakers either don't work, or are so low they cannot be heard, even on BlueRay 5.1/7.1..The Sub woofer loses connection to the soundbar constantly and needs to be re-Paired--Item will be returned
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hutt

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to set up. Finally got it working and the next time I turned it on no sound. Had to keep pressing the selection button but it finally came on. The sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyMontano

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it cause it didn’t came with the power supply
customer_reviews.author: franky

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great. The slim line easily fits under a non-wall ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. The slim line easily fits under a non-wall mounted TV. Still very buggy though. The sub (and therefore the satellite speakers) still unpair after most uses. So I have to pull the couch out (the slimline speaker is awesome because it is out of sight), unplug the sub, and plug it back in for it to pair up again and work....2 stars for now, but could easily be 5 stars without this hassle.
customer_reviews.author: ndlk98

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste money and time on this item!
customer_reviews.text: Same pairing issues as with other reviews for this product I have read. Sounds is awesome at first, but the subwoofer s***s off after awhile. Then can't get it to work again. I am on the third unit now and waiting for a fourth. Same problem each time. If the 4th bit doesn't work, then will not try again with this unit. Vizio support tries, but told me they have not had any reported issues with this type of situation. I don't think they truly care. Do NOT purchase this item, as is seems this issue this a real problem that hasn't been corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Bruh 😍😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound system. I love it. Everything worked out of the box. Setup was extremely easy. I had it completely setup in minutes. So far no issues what so ever. I don't know why people leave bad reviews for this item. Their are no issues with it what so ever. Bluetooth works flawlessly. Casting audio works with no issues. I love that feature. Movies and games sound incredible. The bass is just right and smooth for me. I love the thin subwoofer. I have the sound bar in my room and I put the subwoofer under my bed.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just terrible, ordered this product twice and both time the subwoofer and back speakers didn't work
customer_reviews.author: matt

product_meta.title: VIZIO SB4051-D5 Smartcast 40” 5.1 Slim Sound Bar System, Black
product_meta.description: Introducing the all new VIZIO Smart Cast 40? 5.1 Sound Bar System. The included wireless subwoofer and rear satellite speakers deliver fully immersive 5.1 true surround sound at levels up to 101 dB1. Our new slim wireless subwoofer fits conveniently beneath or beside your sofa. Download the VIZIO Smart Cast app2 to turn your mobile device into the ultimate remote and discover music across multiple apps at once. With Google Cast built in, you can cast your favorite tunes from 100+ audio apps you already know and love to your sound bar. Connect multiple VIZIO Smart Cast sound bars or speakers together to cast the same music to any or every room.Satellite Speaker Frequency : 150 Hz – 20 kHz
feature_bullets: True 5.1 listening: enjoy 5.1 Surround sound with the included rear Surround sound speakers and wireless subwoofer

Download the VIZIO Smart Cast app to turn your smartphone or tablet into a powerful touchscreen remote; Simply tap the Cast button from 100 plus audio apps you already know and love to start playing on your sound bar
101 decibel of room filling, crystal clear sound with less than 1 percent total harmonic distortion
